subject: Status Order #SSN5646
description_text:
Hi,

I was wondering if you could give me some information regarding the status
of the order I placed a week ago, with nr
#SSN5646 .

I would love to hear from you.

Kind regards,

Roy Smits

E: roysmits24@gmail.com

conversations.body_text: Hi, I was wondering if you could respond to this ticket, to give me an idea. Thanks

Hi Roy Smits,  We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible. Compensation will be provided based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.

Thanks for the update. I am looking forward to receiving the shipping
confirmation and tracking information. Hope this will happen soon, can't
wait to use the pedals.

Kind regards,

Roy


T: +31 657949746
E: roysmits24@gmail.com
Hi Roy Smits,  â€‹Thank you for your understanding,Thank you for your inquiry. Should you have any questions, please feel free to contact us anytime. We will respond as soon as possible.
